title: An Expert Is actually By My Side - Novel Updates
tags: Artificial Intelligence   Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Late Romance   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Mysterious Past   Overpowered Protagonist   Transported to Another World
author: Morning Star LL   晨星LL
description:
How does it feel to find out that all your dorm mates are big shots on your first day of school?

Hao Yun has the most say in this matter.

Having been chosen by the Otherworldly Expert System, he unexpectedly obtains the ability to see the future potential of others. He discovers that his roommates are all future big shots with explosive potential.

Then why should he work hard?

Wouldn’t just being cozy with them solve all problems?

Normal people would think that way, and Hao Yun is no exception.

However, just when Hao Yun thinks that he can easily become a winner in life as long as he cozies up with them, he surprisingly finds these so-called big shots are quite fragile.

And these great artists, superstars, academics, and the richest people in the world, who finally reach the pinnacle of their lives with the help of “coincidences”, can’t help but feel lucky when they are interviewed. They are glad that they had such a hidden expert by their side…

Hao Yun: Great, after all this, I am actually your fortuitous encounter!>
